text: Cortex is a word that comes from Latin language, and that is usually translated as shell or bark. The term is used for different concepts: *Cortex (botany), the outer layer of a stem or bark. *Cortex (archaeology), the outer layer of rock *Cell cortex, directly below the cell membrane *Cortex (anatomy), the outermost layer of an organ **Renal cortex, the outermost layer of the kidney **Adrenal cortex, the outermost layer of the adrenal gland *Cerebral cortex, a region of the brain
title: Cortex
